location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 409 of 1857, Henry Lacon Anderson, Secretary to Government, Bombay Castle, to Commander Felix Jones, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: This item has a foliation sequence of a small number in the top right hand corner of each folio.

mods.abstract: This letter acknowledges receipt of letter No. 56 sent by Commander Felix Jones reporting the intended expedition of Sheikh Sultan bin Saggar [Saqr] against the Sheekeeyeen [Sharqiyin] of Dibba to avenge the killing of his grandson. It approves the tone of the letters sent to Shaikh Sultan bin Saqr.
